qas.question: When was the first madrasa started in North America?
What country has many students that attend Al-Rashid Islamic Institute?
What organization did Shaykh Muhammad Alsahareef start?
When was the last madrasa started in North America?
What country has many students that don't attend Al-Rashid Islamic Institute?
What organization did Shaykh Muhammad Alsahareef tear down?

context: The first Madressa established in North America, Al-Rashid Islamic Institute, was established in <a2_0><b6_0>Cornwall, Ontario<b6_0/><a2_0/> in <a0_0><b4_0>1983<b4_0/><a0_0/> and has graduates who are Hafiz (Quran) and Ulama. The seminary was established by Mazhar Alam under the direction of his teacher the leading Indian Tablighi scholar Muhammad Zakariya Kandhlawi and focuses on the traditional Hanafi school of thought and shuns Salafist / Wahabi teachings. Due to its proximity to the <a1_0>US<a1_0/> border city of Messina the school has historically had a high ratio of <b5_0>US<b5_0/> students. Their most prominent graduate Shaykh Muhammad Alshareef completed his Hifz in the early 1990s then went on to deviate from his traditional roots and form the Salafist organization the <a3_0><b7_0>AlMaghrib Institute<b7_0/><a3_0/>.
